thread.title: Soldier makes ‘Back to the Future’ town out of paper (14 Photos)
thread.title_full: Soldier makes ‘Back to the Future’ town out of paper (14 Photos)

author: Chiver Submitted
title: Soldier makes ‘Back to the Future’ town out of paper (14 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
We’re proud to bring you another guest gallery uploaded by iCHIVE user @Lozo . Submit your gallery to iCHIVE for a chance to have it featured on theCHIVE homepage, earn the “Great Scott” badge, as well as 3,000 Chive Points. 
We’ll let @Lozo take it from here… 
Captain Lorenzo Aranda of the US Army was bored while he was deployed to Afghanistan in 2015 so he decided to make an exact replica of Hill Valley, the town from “Back to the Future.” He used the only materials he had at his disposal; a color printer, glue, scissors, and a hell of a lot of paper. Check out the photos below and see how meticulous he was in constructing it. 2
